libraryStrings.tourWelcome:
This tour guides you through the most important features of the Idea Board Exercise.

Start this tour at any time by pressing the Tour button in the top right corner

Press "Exit" to skip this tour or press "Next" to continue.
libraryStrings.tourTaskDescription:
Add your task description here. It will be shown next to the board area.

If your task consists of several steps, you can optionally choose whether the content from the previous board should be reused from the second board onwards. If so, activate the option.
libraryStrings.tourTitleHeadline:
Enter a title and headline for your exercise and configure the board area.

You can design the background (color, image), select the card type (text, image, audio, video) that learners can use, and create cards on the board yourself using the icons at the top right of the board.
libraryStrings.tourCompletionConditions: For multi-step tasks, you can set completion conditions that must be met before learners can move on to the next step.
libraryStrings.tourAddIdeaBoard: To create multi-step tasks, you can add additional boards.
libraryStrings.tourAddSummaryScreen: Optionally, you can insert any other H5P element at the end of the exercise.
